answers.answer: Hi DL- I'm sure your arm/finger issues are drving you nuts. They don't scream MS to me though. Have you been evaluated by a neurologist? What kinds of tests, MRI's etc have you had?Kyle

question: my right arm is really achey - have been to therapy but it still aches and I have a bad right  trigger finger that goes and comes - what's going on and why isn't this healing?  Can something else be happening with my arm?  By the way i have type 2 diabetes and high blood pressure.
title: ACHEY ARM
